description:
nova-manage project list and nova-manage user list looks broken

nova-manage project list and nova-manage user list show nothing.

ubuntu@unagi221:~/devstack$ nova-manage project list
2012-03-08 13:48:07 DEBUG nova.utils [req-fb3a7ebf-0223-45a0-bcec-619b879b7b42 None None] backend <module 'nova.db.sqlalchemy.api' from '/opt/stack/nova/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.pyc'> from (pid=31080) __get_backend /opt/stack/nova/nova/utils.py:660
ubuntu@unagi221:~/devstack$ nova-manage user list
2012-03-08 13:49:04 DEBUG nova.utils [req-a0e89a51-39f2-403c-a65c-e1e3f5c72051 None None] backend <module 'nova.db.sqlalchemy.api' from '/opt/stack/nova/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.pyc'> from (pid=31184) __get_backend /opt/stack/nova/nova/utils.py:660
ubuntu@unagi221:~/devstack$ 

However I could see users in essex dashboard.
title: nova-manage project list and nova-manage user list looks broken

comments.content:
nova-manage project list and nova-manage user list looks broken

nova-manage project list and nova-manage user list show nothing.

ubuntu@unagi221:~/devstack$ nova-manage project list
2012-03-08 13:48:07 DEBUG nova.utils [req-fb3a7ebf-0223-45a0-bcec-619b879b7b42 None None] backend <module 'nova.db.sqlalchemy.api' from '/opt/stack/nova/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.pyc'> from (pid=31080) __get_backend /opt/stack/nova/nova/utils.py:660
ubuntu@unagi221:~/devstack$ nova-manage user list
2012-03-08 13:49:04 DEBUG nova.utils [req-a0e89a51-39f2-403c-a65c-e1e3f5c72051 None None] backend <module 'nova.db.sqlalchemy.api' from '/opt/stack/nova/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.pyc'> from (pid=31184) __get_backend /opt/stack/nova/nova/utils.py:660
ubuntu@unagi221:~/devstack$ 

However I could see users in essex dashboard.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~nati-ueno

comments.content: Yes they are deprecated in favor of keystone. They still exist for people using deprecated auth but they will be removed as soon as folsom opens.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
